title: Theatrhythm_Final_Fantasy_Curtain_Call_USA_3DS-XPA
description:
Tap Into a Timeless Legacy of Music!


Stay "tuned" for more videos from the THEATRHYTHM FINAL FANTASY CURTAIN CALL Legacy of Music Campaign, featuring previews of the songs you'll be able to tap along to on September 16th, 2014 when the game releases on Nintendo 3DS!

A sequel to the first FINAL FANTASY rhythm action game, THEATRHYTHM FINAL FANTASY CURTAIN CALLÃ¢â€žÂ¢ expands on the original in every way with new gameplay modes, 221 songs, and over 60 playable characters. Featuring music that spans the full breadth of the storied FINAL FANTASY franchise, players tap along to the memorable beats and harmonies as the adorable, stylized characters battle and quest through their worlds. The music of over 20 titles is brought together in one package, fusing together the moving scores, cinematic visuals, and role-playing elements the series is known for.

To enjoy the 3D effect of Nintendo 3DS software, you must experience it from the system itself. All screenshots and videos on this website have been captured in 2D mode. 
Use Parental Controls to restrict 3D mode for children 6 and under.

Don't forget to SEED, RATE and ENJOY!
